title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: (See Monastery, vol. i.) From this bridge the Girthgate, a path to the sanctuary of Soutra, runs up the valley of Allan Water, and over the moors to Soutra Ilill.

title: A Tour in Tartan-Land
author: Bede, Cuthbert
snippet: Traces of it have been discovered in a defensive wall that passed across the neck of the peninsula ; and the names of Chapel-knowe, Monk-ford,Haly Wheel, and Girthgate, still exist to remind us ofthe first Abbey of Melrose.
